description:
The DCMI Type Vocabulary was created in 2001.  It defines classes for basic types of thing that can be described using DCMI metadata terms.

Version: 2012-06-14

Collection.label: Collection
Collection.description: A collection is described as a group; its parts may also be separately described.

Dataset.label: Dataset
Dataset.description: Data encoded in a defined structure.

Image.label: Image
Image.description: A visual representation other than text.

InteractiveResource.label: Interactive Resource
InteractiveResource.description: A resource requiring interaction from the user to be understood, executed, or experienced.

MovingImage.label: Moving Image
MovingImage.description: A series of visual representations imparting an impression of motion when shown in succession.

PhysicalObject.label: Physical Object
PhysicalObject.description: An inanimate, three-dimensional object or substance.

Service.label: Service
Service.description: A system that provides one or more functions.

Software.label: Software
Software.description: A computer program in source or compiled form.

Sound.label: Sound
Sound.description: A resource primarily intended to be heard.

Text.label: Text
Text.description: A resource consisting primarily of words for reading.
